summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 28, 2019. It includes inmate count sheets, out-count forms, and an inmate roster, which notably lists Jeffrey Epstein as an inmate assigned to an attorney visit. The documents are routine prison logs from the day of Epstein's incarceration.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster with register number 76318-054, assigned to an attorney visit (ATTY) on July 28, 2019.

events.title: Epstein's Incarceration at MCC New York
events.description: Administrative prison records show Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, with a specific register number and an assignment for an attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 28, 2019, with federal register number 76318-054.
An inmate roster from that date shows Epstein was assigned to an 'ATTY' (attorney) visit, indicating legal activity during his incarceration.
The documents are routine Bureau of Prisons administrative forms, including count sheets and out-count forms, providing a snapshot of prison operations on that date.
The file contains multiple forms (EFTA00119623 through EFTA00119631) that are part of a set of prison records.
